text: Advects a position by a set of volume primitives stored in a disk file.

Advects the provided position through the velocity field contained in the named
set of three volumes or vector VDB.  The

method takes only a single
step in the velocity field, but the various

methods can take multiple steps
within a voxel to avoid violating the
are more accurate but take multiple velocity samples per step and are more expensive to evaluate. Higher
values will result in fewer steps overall but more errors.

title: Advect by Volumes
summary: Advects a position by a set of volume primitives stored in a disk file.
